long_description: Easy to paddle and easy to love, the Old Town Heron 9 kayak enhances your fun on the water. Perfect for small paddlers, the Old Town Heron 9 offers easy maneuverability and high stability on flatwater and slow-moving rivers. Relatively short hull eases transport to the water, turns readily and takes up less space in your garage than a long boat. Single-layer polyethylene stands up to tough aquatic environments, offers high value and cleans up in a flash. Comfort Flex seat moves with every stroke and adjusts to personalize your position in the cockpit; padding in the seat and backrest ensures daylong comfort. Adjustable footbraces ensure an efficient stroke and aid in tracking. Seat features a beverage holder, and foam inserts in bow and stern increase flotation if water enters the cockpit. Bow and stern carry handles make transporting the 39 lb. Heron 9 kayak easy.
short_description: Easy to paddle and easy to love, the Old Town Heron 9 kayak enhances your fun on the water.
